title: Lantern of the serpent ward
body:
So I unlocked Lantern of the serpent ward (permament) but I can't find that ward from the game. I surely unlocked it and it is even in my purchase history.
Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body: There's currently an issue where some ward skins are not selectable despite being unlocked on the account.  I have no eta for a fix just now, but I was able to confirm that the Lantern of the Serpent Ward has been unlocked on your account. I hope that helps give some ease!
